readable.title: 3143765063_a7761b16d3
readable.content: A man in an elf hat holding a white umbrella is standing on the sidewalk with two other men . A man in a pointed red hat holds a white umbrella . A man is wearing a Santa hat and holding a white umbrella while two men with orangish red boas look on in amusement . People walk out of a building past two manequins . Two men in black leather jackets , glasses , and hats , open them up for walkers .
